item.title: Defiant Arizona Lawmaker Could Face Charges After Tipping Off Illegals To ICE Presence
item.description: State Sen. Analise Ortiz, a Phoenix Dem, admits she 'shared information about ICE' — an act that a DHS official says 'looks like obstruction.'

item.title: Harvard Continues Race-Based Admissions Even After SCOTUS Affirmative Action Decision: Complaint
item.description: Harvard signaled it would find a way to bypass the Supreme Court's decision within hours after it came down in 2023.
